hints.content: Let's look at each graph and find the value of Frozen Field, Winter Hil, and Blizzard Run.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Sledding Hill and the vertical axis labeled Height in meters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Blizzard Run, Winter Hill, Snow Slope, and Frozen Field. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50 and 60. The bar line for each type of sledding hill shows the following: Blizzard Run bar line labeled 55 extends to the middle of 50 and 60, Winter Hill bar line labeled 10 extends to 10, Snow Slope bar line extends to 20, and Frozen Field bar line labeled 45 extends to the middle of 40 and 50. !

A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Sledding Hill and the vertical axis labeled Height in meters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Blizzard Run, Winter Hill, Snow Slope, and Frozen Field. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50 and 60. The bar line for each type of sledding hill shows the following: Blizzard Run bar line labeled 35 extends to the middle of 30 and 40, Winter Hill bar line labeled 15 extends to the middle of 10 and 20, Snow Slope bar line extends to 40, and Frozen Field bar line labeled 50 extends to 50. !

hints.content:
This graph show the height difference between Winter Hill and Frozen Field equals the height of Blizzard Run:


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Sledding Hill and the vertical axis labeled Height in meters. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Blizzard Run, Winter Hill, Snow Slope, and Frozen Field. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50 and 60. The bar line for each type of sledding hill shows the following: Blizzard Run bar line extends to the middle of 30 and 40, Winter Hill bar line extends to the middle of 10 and 20, Snow Slope bar line extends to 40, and Frozen Field bar line extends to 50. !

question.content:
**In which graph does the height difference between Winter Hill and Frozen Field equal the height of Blizzard Run?**

[[☃ radio 1]]
